name: part_009
file: tmp_【#ちょこ先生誕2021】ちょこ先生の3Dお誕生日会【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [p9k8A3XzH68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Choco-sensei talking to fans about her birthday and presents in a castle room setting.
Transition scene showing Choco-sensei's legs and outfit as she moves to the live stage.

subtitles.original: ...彩って頂けたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: ...I'd be happy if you could brighten it up!

subtitles.original: なんと今回ね スパチャレッドカーペットと
subtitles.english: And this time, with the Super Chat Red Carpet...

subtitles.original: 普通のスーパーチャットでは
subtitles.english: ...and regular Super Chats,

subtitles.original: 今回チョコ、プレゼント募集してなくて
subtitles.english: Choco didn't ask for any presents this time,

subtitles.original: お手紙だけっていうお誕生日のやつを
subtitles.english: and went with a "letters only" birthday instead,

subtitles.original: 取らせて頂いてたんですけど ぜひここで
subtitles.english: but by all means, right here...

subtitles.original: そう、めっちゃあったのリプに
subtitles.english: Yeah, there were so many replies like,

subtitles.original: 「チョコ先生なんで手紙だけなの？」みたいな
subtitles.english: "Choco-sensei, why only letters?"

subtitles.original: 「あれ？プレゼント送りたかったのに」みたいな
subtitles.english: "Wait, I wanted to send a present!"

subtitles.original: ま、ぜひぜひ、皆様、プレゼントもね 頂けたら
subtitles.english: So, please, everyone, if I could receive presents too...

subtitles.original: ここで頂けたらチョコは嬉しいです！ということで
subtitles.english: I'd be happy to receive them here! And so,

subtitles.original: それでは レッツ・スタート！
subtitles.english: without further ado, let's start!

subtitles.original: スパチャおめでとう、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for the Super Chats!

subtitles.original: そうなんです 今回はね
subtitles.english: That's right. This time,

subtitles.original: みんなにとっておいてって言ったのは
subtitles.english: the reason I told everyone to save up,

subtitles.original: このためです ありがとう いつも
subtitles.english: was for this. Thank you, as always.

subtitles.original: そう、久々の3D配信
subtitles.english: Yes, it's been a while since my last 3D stream.

subtitles.original: 皆様いかがでしょうか？
subtitles.english: How do you all like it?

subtitles.original: 運営さん、アップでお願いします
subtitles.english: Management, can I get a close-up please?

subtitles.original: チョコ先生おめでとうございます
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます ちょっとチョコの顔面アップでいいですか？
subtitles.english: Thank you. Can I get a close-up of Choco's face?

subtitles.original: みんな、いつもありがとう
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for everything.

subtitles.original: わあ、すごい
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing.

subtitles.original: 最近ね、ちょっといろいろバタバタしとって
subtitles.english: Lately, things have been a bit hectic,

subtitles.original: 配信頻度が減っちゃってますが
subtitles.english: so my streaming frequency has dropped,

subtitles.original: これからもね 癒月チョコ 頑張っていこうと思うので
subtitles.english: but I'll keep doing my best as Yuzuki Choco,

subtitles.original: これからもよろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: so I look forward to your continued support.

subtitles.original: ありがとう みんな お誕生日おめでとう ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone. Thank you for the birthday wishes!

subtitles.original: ありがとう みんな
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone.

subtitles.original: それでは
subtitles.english: And now,

subtitles.original: ライブ会場の方に 行きたいと思います
subtitles.english: I'd like to head over to the live performance venue.

subtitles.original: ベノム
subtitles.english: Venom

subtitles.original: 作詞/作曲:Kairiki bear(かいりきベア)
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Kairiki bear

subtitles.original: 足りないものなんだ 僕らの人生
subtitles.english: What is missing? Our lives.

subtitles.original: 正解どこなんだ 僕らの人生
subtitles.english: Where is the answer? Our lives.
